title: Plasma: the fourth state of matter
creator_credit: Film Associates of California and Robert Mack
brief_description: Explores the properties and potential uses of plasma, the fourth state of matter, in which energy causes the atoms themselves to break down into free electrons, protons or ions. Suitable for secondary level.
creator_credit_for_label: Film Associates of California and Robert Mack
